process-steps.compiled-parameters:
<parameters><method>xml</method><xslt><xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:mdm="java:com.amalto.core.plugin.base.xslt.MdmExtension" version="1.0">  
    <xsl:output method="xml" indent="yes" omit-xml-declaration="yes"/>  
    <xsl:template match="/" priority="1"> 
        <exchange> 
            <item> 
                <xsl:copy-of select="mdm:getItemProjection(exchange/report/Update/RevisionID,exchange/report/Update/DataCluster,exchange/report/Update/Concept,exchange/report/Update/Key)"/> 
            </item> 
        </exchange> 
    </xsl:template> 
</xsl:stylesheet></xslt><sheet>rO0ABXA=</sheet></parameters>
process-steps.parameters: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:mdm="java:com.amalto.core.plugin.base.xslt.MdmExtension" version="1.0"> <xsl:output method="xml" indent="yes" omit-xml-declaration="yes"/> <xsl:template match="/" priority="1"> <exchange> <item> <xsl:copy-of select="mdm:getItemProjection(exchange/report/Update/RevisionID,exchange/report/Update/DataCluster,exchange/report/Update/Concept,exchange/report/Update/Key)"/> </item> </exchange> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>
